tasks.task: Discussing precision farming department growth and responsibilities
subtasks: Explain the speaker's (Eric Ruderskold) experience and role at Johnson Tractor
Describe the expansion of the precision farming department over three years
Outline current staffing and roles within the department
Discuss integration of precision farming into mainstream tractor equipment
Address the increasing role of technicians in operating and maintaining new equipment
Explain the importance of understanding monitor functions and equipment integration
Mention examples of specialty crop farming and seed corn cultivation
Describe the need for row shutoff controls in specialty crops and seed corn
Highlight the benefits of new technology for planting and input management

tasks.task: Discussing precision farming department growth and responsibilities**
